name: William Green's Plan of Manchester & Salford (1787-94)
description: Comprehensive nine-sheet map drawn from actual survey, engraved by J. Thornton. Features street names, public buildings, landowners names, and proposed new streets. Decorative title with allegorical figures.
notes:
IIIF: https://www.digitalcollections.manchester.ac.uk/iiif/PR-R-15369
Image: https://image.digitalcollections.manchester.ac.uk/iiif/PR-R-15369-000-00001.jp2
9 sheets. Survey begun 1787, completed 1794.
